mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPORT (rep_no, reporter, w_date, content, q_no, reported, code) VALUES (r_seq.nextval, #{reporter}, sysdate, #{content}, #{q_no}, #{reported}, #{code})
mapper.select: SELECT R.REP_NO AS REP_NO, R.REPORTER AS REPORTER,R.REPORTED AS REPORTED, R.W_DATE AS W_DATE, R.CONTENT AS CONTENT, F.CONTENT AS F_CONTENT FROM REPORT R, F_CODE F WHERE R.CODE = F.CODE ORDER BY R.REP_NO
SELECT R.CODE AS CODE, F.CONTENT AS CONTENT, COUNT(F.CODE) AS COUNT FROM F_CODE F, REPORT R WHERE R.CODE=F.CODE AND F.CODE = {code} GROUP BY F.CODE,F.CONTENT,R.CODE
